mapper.sql: lh.Fliquidation_id AS liquidationId, lh.Forder_id AS orderId, lh.Faccount_id AS accountId, lh.Faccount_code AS accountCode, lh.Faccount_name AS accountName, lh.Fterm_code AS termCode, lh.Faccount_type AS accountType, lh.Forgan_level AS organLevel, lh.Forgan_id AS organId, lh.Fproduct_id AS productId, lh.Ftrans_type AS transType, lh.Ftrans_kind AS transKind, lh.Fclear_type AS clearType, lh.Ffee_type AS feeType, lh.Fcash_type AS cashType, lh.Fcash_account_id AS cashAccountId, lh.Fcard_no AS cardNo, lh.Fclear_state AS clearState, lh.Fclear_date AS clearDate, lh.Fsettle_period AS settlePeriod, lh.Fcreate_time AS createTime, lh.Forder_time AS orderTime, lh.Fclear_time AS clearTime, lh.Famount AS amount, lh.Forg_amount AS orgAmount, lh.Faccount_rate AS accountRate, lh.Faccount_fee AS accountFee, lh.Forgan2_id AS organ2Id, lh.Forgan2_rate AS organ2Rate, lh.Forgan2_fee AS organ2Fee, lh.Forgan1_id AS organ1Id, lh.Forgan1_rate AS organ1Rate, lh.Forgan1_fee AS organ1Fee, lh.Fgorgan_id AS gorganId, lh.Fgorgan_fee AS gorganFee, lh.Fchannel_id AS channelId, lh.Fchannel_rate AS channelRate, lh.Fchannel_cost AS channelCost, lh.Fsettle_flag AS settleFlag, lh.Fsettle_batchno AS settleBatchno, lh.Faffiliate_trans_flag AS affiliateTransFlag, lh.Fext_field1 AS extField1, lh.Fext_field2 AS extField2, lh.Fext_field3 AS extField3, lh.Fext_field4 AS extField4, lh.Fsplit_column AS splitColumn
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_liquidation_his ( Fliquidation_id, Forder_id, Faccount_id, Faccount_code, Faccount_name, Fterm_code, Faccount_type, Forgan_level, Forgan_id, Fproduct_id, Ftrans_type, Ftrans_kind, Fclear_type, Ffee_type, Fcash_type, Fcash_account_id, Fcard_no, Fclear_state, Fclear_date, Fsettle_period, Fcreate_time, Forder_time, Fclear_time, Famount, Forg_amount, Faccount_rate, Faccount_fee, Forgan2_id, Forgan2_rate, Forgan2_fee, Forgan1_id, Forgan1_rate, Forgan1_fee, Fgorgan_id, Fgorgan_fee, Fchannel_id, Fchannel_rate, Fchannel_cost, Fsettle_flag, Fsettle_batchno, Faffiliate_trans_flag, Fext_field1, Fext_field2, Fext_field3, Fext_field4, Fsplit_column ) VALUES ( #{liquidationId}, #{orderId}, #{accountId}, #{accountCode}, #{accountName}, #{termCode}, #{accountType}, #{organLevel}, #{organId}, #{productId}, #{transType}, #{transKind}, #{clearType}, #{feeType}, #{cashType}, #{cashAccountId}, #{cardNo}, #{clearState}, #{clearDate}, #{settlePeriod}, #{createTime}, #{orderTime}, #{clearTime}, #{amount}, #{orgAmount}, #{accountRate}, #{accountFee}, #{organ2Id}, #{organ2Rate}, #{organ2Fee}, #{organ1Id}, #{organ1Rate}, #{organ1Fee}, #{gorganId}, #{gorganFee}, #{channelId}, #{channelRate}, #{channelCost}, #{settleFlag}, #{settleBatchno}, #{affiliateTransFlag}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{extField4}, #{splitColumn} )
mapper.update:
update t_liquidation_his
Fliquidation_id = #{liquidationId},
Forder_id =#{orderId},
Faccount_id = #{accountId},
Faccount_code =#{accountCode},
Faccount_name =#{accountName},
Fterm_code =#{termCode},
Faccount_type =#{accountType},
Forgan_level =#{organLevel},
Forgan_id = #{organId},
Fproduct_id = #{productId},
Ftrans_type =#{transType},
Ftrans_kind =#{transKind},
Fclear_type =#{clearType},
Ffee_type =#{feeType},
Fcash_type =#{cashType},
Fcash_account_id = #{cashAccountId},
Fcard_no =#{cardNo},
Fclear_state =#{clearState},
Fclear_date =#{clearDate},
Fsettle_period =#{settlePeriod},
Fcreate_time = #{createTime},
Forder_time = #{orderTime},
Fclear_time = #{clearTime},
Famount = #{amount},
Forg_amount = #{orgAmount},
Faccount_rate =#{accountRate},
Faccount_fee =#{accountFee},
Forgan2_id = #{organ2Id},
Forgan2_rate =#{organ2Rate},
Forgan2_fee = #{organ2Fee},
Forgan1_id = #{organ1Id},
Forgan1_rate =#{organ1Rate},
Forgan1_fee = #{organ1Fee},
Fgorgan_id = #{gorganId},
Fgorgan_fee = #{gorganFee},
Fchannel_id = #{channelId},
Fchannel_rate =#{channelRate},
Fchannel_cost = #{channelCost},
Fsettle_flag =#{settleFlag},
Fsettle_batchno =#{settleBatchno},
Faffiliate_trans_flag =#{affiliateTransFlag},
Fext_field1 =#{extField1},
Fext_field2 =#{extField2},
Fext_field3 =#{extField3},
Fext_field4 =#{extField4},
Fsplit_column = #{splitColumn},
where Forder_id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: select from t_liquidation_his lh where lh.Forder_id = #{orderId}
